alert.note: Alert for Darke; Miami; Montgomery; Preble; Shelby (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 7:42PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHERN SHELBY, NORTHEASTERN PREBLE, SOUTHEASTERN DARKE, NORTHWESTERN MONTGOMERY AND MIAMI COUNTIES THROUGH 815 PM EDT... At 742 PM EDT, strong thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Newport to near Lewisburg, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Dayton, Huber Heights, Troy, Trotwood, Sidney, Piqua, Vandalia, Englewood, Tipp City, West Milton, Covington, Arcanum, Newport, Bradford, Lewisburg, Pleasant Hill, Hardin, Clayton, Union and Brookville. This includes the following Interstates... I-70 in Ohio between mile markers 7 and 35. I-75 in Ohio between mile markers 60 and 93. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for west central Ohio. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
